title: Priti Patel – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Priti Patel, the Conservative MP for Witham, on Twitter on 22 October 2022.
content:
Boris [Johnson] has the mandate to deliver our elected manifesto and a proven track record getting the big decisions right. I’m backing him in the leadership contest.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
